text: José Antonio Alonso Suárez (28 March 1960 - 2 February 2017) was a Spanish politician and judge. He was a member of the Socialist Workers' Party (PSOE). He was the Minister of the Interior from 2004 to 2006 and the Minister of Defence from 2006 to 2008. He was born in León, León. Alonso died from lung cancer on 2 February 2017 in Madrid. He was 56. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Government ministers Category:Spanish judges Category:Spanish Socialist Workers' Party politicians
title: José Antonio Alonso
